gghighcharts converts a restricted subset of ggplot2 plots to highcharter widgets by inspecting the built ggplot.

## Installation

```r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ZhenyaKosovan/gghighcharts")
```

## Usage

```r
library(ggplot2)
library(gghighcharts)

p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) + geom_point()
hc_from_ggplot(p)
```

## Supported charts

- Line charts: geom_line(), geom_step()
- Scatter plots: geom_point()
- Bar and column charts: geom_col(), geom_bar(), geom_histogram()
- Area charts: geom_area(), geom_ribbon()
- Statistical: geom_smooth(), geom_boxplot(), geom_errorbar()
- Reference lines: geom_hline(), geom_vline()

## Supported axes

- X axis: discrete, numeric, Date, POSIXct
- Y axis: numeric
